entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
